V03vinv14_u:5: tataḥ śāstrāṇi vigarhitvā saṃghena pṛṣṭaḥ poṣadhaḥ //
V03vinv14_u:7: tac ca poṣadhasūtraṃ madhyamāgame saṃgītanipāte paṭhyate //
V03vinv14_u:11: uktaṃ bhagavatā saṃghasthavireṇa tv ardhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśa uddeṣṭavya iti /
V03vinv14_u:22: yatra bhikṣavo divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā codayanti smārayanti /
V03vinv14_u:23: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
V03vinv14_u:26: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuś codayitavyaḥ smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:27: bhikṣur divyena cakṣuṣā dṛṣṭvā bhikṣuṃ codayati smārayati sātisāro bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:28: yathā divyena cakṣuṣā evaṃ divyena śrotreṇa /
V03vinv14_u:29: punar apy asāv upadhivārikaḥ saṃghasthavirasya purastāt sthitvā kathayati /
V03vinv14_u:35: sthavira katham nāma tvayā saṃghamadhye mama śirasi muṣṭir nipātitā /
V03vinv14_u:36: aho batāhaṃ tvayā ekānte coditaḥ syām iti /
V03vinv14_u:41: saced ekānte codyamāno na smarati smārayitavyaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:63: amūlakena kṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:67: idam ekam adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam ekaṃ dhārmikam* /
V03vinv14_u:70: amūlakenākṛtenāmūlakena kṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:71: samūlakenākṛtena samūlakena kṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:72: ime dve adhārmike poṣadhasthāpane dve dhārmike /
V03vinv14_u:75: amūlakena kṛtena amūlakenākṛtena amūlakena kṛtākṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:76: samūlakena kṛtena samūlakenākṛtena samūlakena kṛtākṛtena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:77: imāni trīṇy adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni trīṇi dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:80: amūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:81: (312v1 = GBM 6.937) samūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:82: imāni catvāry adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni catvāri dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:85: amūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:86: (MSV III 110) samūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:88: ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni /
V03vinv14_u:91: amūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:93: samūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:94: imāni ṣaḍ adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni ṣaḍ dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:97: amūlikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā amūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:98: samūlakikayā śīlavipattyā dṛṣṭivipattyā ācāravipattyā ājīvavipattyā samūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:103: pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā amūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:104: samūlikayā pārājikayā saṃghāvaśeṣayā pāyantikayā pratideśanikayā duṣkṛtayā samūlakena dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṃkitena poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati dhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:105: imāni aṣṭāv adhārmikāṇi poṣadhasthāpanāni aṣṭau dhārmikāṇi /
V03vinv14_u:109: amūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa /
V03vinv14_u:110: amūlakena kṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa amūlakenākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa amūlakena kṛtākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayaty adhārmikaṃ poṣadhasthāpanam* /
V03vinv14_u:112: samūlakena kṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena sāvaśeṣeṇa /
V03vinv14_u:113: samūlakena kṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa samūlakenākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa samūlakena kṛtākṛtena niravaśeṣeṇa poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati (313r1 = GBM 6.938)
V03vinv14_u:125: śīlavipanno na bhavati na dṛṣṭivipanno nācāravipanno nājīvavipannaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:127: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyamānam* /
V03vinv14_u:128: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:132: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:133: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā /
V03vinv14_u:134: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:135: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya ca poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:139: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kriyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ śikṣāpratyākhyānaṃ kurvāṇam* /
V03vinv14_u:140: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:144: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:145: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:146: (MSV III 113) te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:147: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:151: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ saṃghaḥ pratyākhyāyate taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārair na tair liṅgair na tair nimittaiḥ saṃghapratyākhyānaṃ kurvantam* /
V03vinv14_u:152: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:154: evaṃ saṃgho na pratyākhyāto na bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:156: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:157: sā ca kathā na lajjā bhavati na tanmayā na viprakṛtā bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:158: te ca bhikṣavaḥ utthāyāsanebhyo nānā viprakrāmanti /
V03vinv14_u:159: sa cādṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:163: caturṇāṃ pārājikānām anyatamānyatamām āpattim āpanno bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:164: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:168: dvāṣaṣṭer dṛṣṭigatānām anyatarānyatarāṃ dṛṣṭim anabhiniviṣṭo bhavati /
V03vinv14_u:169: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:176: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:181: tasya ca bhikṣur adṛṣṭvā aśrutvā apariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:192: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyate /
V03vinv14_u:193: taṃ ca bhikṣuḥ paśyati na tair ākārais tair liṅgais tair nimittaiḥ pārājikām āpattim āpadyamānam* /
V03vinv14_u:194: sa dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /
V03vinv14_u:198: yathāpi tat saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇā bhavanti saṃnipatitāḥ /
V03vinv14_u:199: sā ca kathā lajjā bhavati tanmayā viprakṛtā /
V03vinv14_u:200: te ca bhikṣavas tathā saṃniṣaṇṇā (MSV III 115) eva /
V03vinv14_u:201: sa ca dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /

V03vinv14_u:241: tasya ca bhikṣur dṛṣṭvā śrutvā pariśaṃkya poṣadhaṃ sthāpayati /

V03vinv14_u:253: alajjisaṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaḥ saṃvṛtisaṃghaḥ paramārthasaṃghaś ca /
V03vinv14_u:257: yatra na sūtradharo na vinayadharo na mātṛkādharaḥ /
V03vinv14_u:264: tatra ye pūrvakās trayaḥ saṃghāḥ alajjinaḥ saṃghaḥ eḍamūkasaṃghaḥ gaṇasaṃghaś ca labhyam ebhir adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:265: yo 'yaṃ saṃvṛtisaṃgho labhyam anena dharmasaṃjñinā adharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
V03vinv14_u:266: yas tv ayaṃ paramārthasaṃgho na labhyam anenādharmeṇa karmaṇā kartum* /
